title: MWC 2023
description: MWC Taiwan 2023 is hosted by Taiwan's largest technical blog. I spoke about Headless CMS system application in frontend.

title: React Summit
description: React Summit 2023 is hosted by the React community. I spoke about the future of React and how it will change the way we build web applications.

title: Vue.js Conference
description: Vue.js Conference 2023 is hosted by the Vue.js community. I spoke about the new features in Vue.js 4 and how it will make developers' lives easier.

title: Angular Connect
description: Angular Connect 2023 is hosted by the Angular community. I spoke about the new features in Angular 13 and how it will make developers' lives easier.

title: Node.js Summit
description: Node.js Summit 2023 is hosted by the Node.js community. I spoke about the new features in Node.js 18 and how it will make developers' lives easier.
